QuestData.Title: Invasion of the Soul Eaters
QuestData.Description: <The note is scrawled hurriedly across the parchment.>$B$BTelmor is lost. The Shadow Council is dragging our fallen into piles and feeding the souls to their leader. There is blood on my hands...$B$BPlease, if anyone reads this message, burn the bodies of our fallen so our enemy cannot use them.$B$B- Restalaan, Captain of the Guard
QuestData.LogDescription: Use torches from a forge to burn $2oa body piles in Telmor.
QuestData.CompletionText: Restalaan would be happy to know that someone fulfilled his wishes.
QuestData.RewardText: The souls of the citizens of Telmor will no longer be used to empower the Shadow Council leader.
